title: Himi 337
lyrics:
7’s
1.
Ko hai ‘a kinautolu,
Teunga hinehina na?
’Oku ulo ngingila,
Lahi hake ’i he la’ā?
2.
Pea nau tu’u ki mu’a,
‘I he kau angatonu;
‘Oku nau ofi, ki he
Taloni ta’engata?
3.
Ko kinautolu ia,
Na’a nau fa’a mo’ua
‘I he ngaahi tautea,
Koe’uhi ko Sīsū.
4.
’O ‘ikai si’i li’aki,
‘A ‘ene fekau mate,
Ka na’a nau tu’uaki,
‘O nau fa’a kātaki.
5.
Ko ia kuo nau ha’u
Mei he fu’u mamahi;
‘O nau fō honau kofu,
‘I he tui ‘i lalo.
6.
Na’e fō ‘i he toto,
‘O e lami, ‘i hena;
‘Oku nau hinehina
‘O hangē ko e sinou.
7.
Ko ia, ‘oku nau tu’u
Hoko mo e taloni;
Pea tauhi ma’u ai pē,
‘A honau ‘Eiki lelei. *
